item.title: Wave Arcade
item.dc:creator: Afaq
item.description: When the fusion of boAt's excellence meets Asia’s premier music festival, get ready for an electrifying experience! Introducing the over-ear wireless headset, the Sunfire Sonic 558 by boAtxSunburn. Featuring the latest Bluetooth v5.0 technology, enjoy instant wireless connectivity like never before. Powered by a robust 500mAh battery, indulge in a whopping 20 hours of uninterrupted playtime to keep you grooving all day long! With 50mm dynamic drivers delivering immersive audio, immerse yourself in your favorite tunes with pulsating bass. Feel the pulse of every beat as the Sunfire Sonic 558 delivers an explosive audio experience.
item.content:encoded:
Features

  1. Immersive Audio Experience: Experience immersive audio that matches your vibe and sets your zone with the Sunfire Sonic 558’s 50mm dynamic drivers.
  2. Over-Ear Comfort: Designed with over-ear comfort in mind, these headphones ensure that your long grooving sessions are enjoyable without compromising on comfort.
  3. Dynamic Sound Drivers: Equipped with powerful 50mm dynamic drivers, these headphones deliver high-quality audio that matches your every beat.
  4. Long-lasting Playback: With a battery capacity of 500mAh, enjoy up to 20 hours of uninterrupted playback time on a single charge.
  5. Bluetooth Connectivity: Featuring Bluetooth version 5.0, these headphones offer seamless connectivity with all Bluetooth-enabled devices within a range of 10 meters.
  6. Fast Charging: With a charging time of just 2.5 hours, you can quickly recharge your headphones for extended listening sessions.
  7. Ergonomic Design: The Sunfire Sonic 558 is ergonomically designed to prioritize your comfort, ensuring that you can groove to your heart’s content without any discomfort.

Specifications:

  • Headphone Type: Over-Ear
  • Driver Type: Moving Coil Driver
  • Impedance: 32Ω
  • Sensitivity: 90dB±3DB
  • Frequency Response: 20Hz-20KHz
  • Standby Time: 180 hours
  • Compatibility: All Bluetooth Devices
  • Country Of Origin: China
  • Imported And Marketed By: Imagine Marketing Limited
  • Net Quantity: 1
